name: Kill Camels
description:
Short description

Kill Camels is a 2D platformer.

To kill camels you can use spells or jump onto their hump !

Levels are divided in 3 parts :

- Learning : Easy levels to understand how to kill a camel and use spells

- Training : Not so easy levels to prepare you for the fight

- Fighting : Tough levels for pro gamers like you

+ A bonus level at the end

Controls

- A / D : Move horizontally
- Space / W : Jump
- Up : Magic spell
- Left / Right : Change spell
- F : Toggle fullscreen
- R : Reload Level
- N : Next level
- K : Kill
- M : Go to menu
- Escape : Quit
